      • getPricingDetails

        public void getPricingDetails()
        Retrieves pricing details from the database and updates local fields to reflect the current prices and discounts available for both individual visitors and groups.

      • calculateDiscountPriceTravelersGroup

        public int calculateDiscountPriceTravelersGroup​(Booking newBooking)
        Calculates the discounted price for a booking made by a travelers' group.
        Parameters:
        newBooking - The booking for which the price is calculated.
        Returns:
        The total price after applying the discount for individual travelers.

      • calculateDiscountPriceGuidedGroup

        public int calculateDiscountPriceGuidedGroup​(Booking newBooking,
                                             boolean prePaid)
        Calculates the discounted price for a booking made by a guided group.
        Parameters:
        newBooking - The booking for which the price is calculated.
        prePaid - Indicates whether the booking was prepaid to apply the appropriate discount.
        Returns:
        The total price after applying the discount for the guided group.

      • calculateRegularPriceTravelersGroup

        public int calculateRegularPriceTravelersGroup​(Booking newBooking)
        Calculates the regular price for a booking made by a travelers' group without any discounts.
        Parameters:
        newBooking - The booking for which the price is calculated.
        Returns:
        The total regular price for the travelers' group.

      • calculateRegularPriceGuidedGroup

        public int calculateRegularPriceGuidedGroup​(Booking newBooking)
        Calculates the regular price for a booking made by a guided group without any discounts.
        Parameters:
        newBooking - The booking for which the price is calculated.
        Returns:
        The total regular price for the guided group.
